The post 2019 – 2020 Academic Planner : Nineteen 06: An 18-Month Weekly Calendar for Kappa Alpha Phi Frats – July 2019 – December 2020 – P4 Publishing appeared first on Hoardible.
item.content:encoded:
Use This Paperback Planner To Keep Track of All Your Important Dates, Priorities, and Obligations

This planner is perfect to help you remember all your personal meetings, appointments and kids’ practices, rehearsals, games, or performances. Make sure you never miss another appointment.

The Cover – The cover is a sturdy paperback book with a glossy finish. The binding is the same as a standard paperback book. (The notebook may need to be pressed open to lie flat.)

Size Dimensions – 8.5″ x 11″

The Interior – The interior of the planner holds 80 pages.

This planner is ideal for anyone with a busy schedule. It makes a great gift for birthdays, Christmas, or any other holiday.

Now that you’ve got all the details on this 2019 – 2020 academic planner, click the buy button to get your copy today.

The post 2019 – 2020 Academic Planner : Nineteen 06: An 18-Month Weekly Calendar for Kappa Alpha Phi Frats – July 2019 – December 2020 – P4 Publishing appeared first on Hoardible.

item.title: Isc Economics ‘road to Board’ : A Compendium of Notes (Class 12, Series-1 Microeconomics).From a successful University of Manchester (QS-27, 2020) Economics’ Applicant – Anand Kumar
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description:
When I was in my class 12th, I chose economics as a subject. It’s a beautiful subject with intricate concepts and I thoroughly loved it. But there was a problem. I had to read through 569 pages of the book to understand the concepts. But only about 100 of those pages were relevant. So I […]

The post Isc Economics ‘road to Board’ : A Compendium of Notes (Class 12, Series-1 Microeconomics).From a successful University of Manchester (QS-27, 2020) Economics’ Applicant – Anand Kumar appeared first on Hoardible.
item.content:encoded:
When I was in my class 12th, I chose economics as a subject. It’s a beautiful subject with intricate concepts and I thoroughly loved it. But there was a problem. I had to read through 569 pages of the book to understand the concepts. But only about 100 of those pages were relevant. So I made notes of these concepts for exam purpose.After the exams, these notes lay gathering dust on my shelf. And when I got selected in University of Manchester for Economics, I realised how much knowledge lays buried in our shelves and how much time it will take another student to make the same notes. Why not form it in a book for ready reference of all those students who are taking the #isc board this year?Presenting to you all #theeconomicsguide_roadtoboard which is a compendium of ready made notes of microeconomics for class 12th. No need to shift through hundreds of pages of filler material. No need to spend hours to make notes from the book. All of this is ready for you at this link.It’s time to study smart and spend your worthy time more productively. Do share with your friends and family who are giving the board exams.

The post Isc Economics ‘road to Board’ : A Compendium of Notes (Class 12, Series-1 Microeconomics).From a successful University of Manchester (QS-27, 2020) Economics’ Applicant – Anand Kumar appeared first on Hoardible.

item.title: A Return to Love : Reflections on the Principles of “a Course in Miracles” – Marianne Williamson (Abridged)
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description:
Back by popular demand — and newly updated by the author — the mega-bestselling spiritual guide in which Marianne Williamson shares her reflections on A Course in Miracles and her insights on the application of love in the search for inner peace. Williamson reveals how we each can become a miracle worker by accepting God […]

The post A Return to Love : Reflections on the Principles of “a Course in Miracles” – Marianne Williamson (Abridged) appeared first on Hoardible.
item.content:encoded:
Back by popular demand — and newly updated by the author — the mega-bestselling spiritual guide in which Marianne Williamson shares her reflections on A Course in Miracles and her insights on the application of love in the search for inner peace.

Williamson reveals how we each can become a miracle worker by accepting God and by the expression of love in our daily lives. Whether psychic pain is in the area of relationships, career, or health, she shows us how love is a potent force, the key to inner peace, and how by practicing love we can make our own lives more fulfilling while creating a more peaceful and loving world for our children.

The post A Return to Love : Reflections on the Principles of “a Course in Miracles” – Marianne Williamson (Abridged) appeared first on Hoardible.
